players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote for Bob."
You: "Charlie, you're just trying to frame me! I'm a villager, and we should vote for you instead."
You: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, revealing it so early is foolish—it just makes you a target. I think you're the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote for Charlie!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
